definitions.definition: In a relaxed or casual manner.
examples: After his illness, John decided to take it easy .

definitions.definition: In a manner without strictness or harshness; gently ; softly .
examples: Jane went easier on him after he broke his arm.
This project will cost 15 million dollars, easy .

main_definition: In a relaxed or casual manner.
secondary_definitions: In a manner without strictness or harshness; gently ; softly .
